EffectDetails.Name: Bass
EffectDetails.Description: Adjusts the level of the low-end frequencies on the wet signal. Adds lighter reverb to thicker, more bass-heavy sound.

EffectDetails.Name: ModulationDepth
EffectDetails.Description: Adds a pitch modulation to the wet signal.

EffectDetails.Name: ModulationNoiseDepth
EffectDetails.Description: Adjust the amount of sporadic modulation applied to the wet signal.

EffectDetails.Name: Size
EffectDetails.Description: Adjusts the size of the effect space.

EffectDetails.Name: Control1
EffectDetails.Description: Custom control 1 particular to reverb mode.

EffectDetails.Name: Control2
EffectDetails.Description: Custom control 2 particular to reverb mode.

EffectDetails.Name: CurveFiltering
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Reverse mode.

EffectDetails.Name: DelayCurveShape
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Reverse mode.

EffectDetails.Name: Diffusion
EffectDetails.Description: Adjusts the density of the reverb reflections. Lower settings produce a more distinct echo effect, while higher settings create a thicker, more enveloping reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: DiffusionModulationDepth
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Hall mode.

EffectDetails.Name: Distortion
EffectDetails.Description: Adjusts the amount of grit on the wet signal, higher settings add fuzz

EffectDetails.Name: DriveDwell
EffectDetails.Description: Intensity dry signal hists the springs.

EffectDetails.Name: EDome
EffectDetails.Description: The cavernous E-DOME produces long reverb trails with a lovely smooth and lush modulation. Invoke the sound of massive arena settings!

EffectDetails.Name: EchoVerb
EffectDetails.Description: For those in need of simultaneous reverb and delay effects, the Echoverb engine provides a sprawling echo effect with huge, ambient repeats.

EffectDetails.Name: EnvelopeGain
EffectDetails.Description: Controls sensitivity of envelope.

EffectDetails.Name: Hall
EffectDetails.Description: Patterned after the lush sounds of studio rack units from the 80s, the Hall L engine is distinguished by its highly diffuse tones and blooming characteristic.

EffectDetails.Name: LoFi
EffectDetails.Description: Turns the lush and grandiose effect of reverb on its head and embraces destructive elements like distortion, oversaturation, and pitch fluctuation.

EffectDetails.Name: MasterOffset
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Offspring mode.

EffectDetails.Name: MasterPreDelay
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Offspring mode.

EffectDetails.Name: MetalBox
EffectDetails.Description: MetalBox captures the reverberations of a very small space with extremely reflective walls – imagine your guitar amp in a metal cargo-shipping container.

EffectDetails.Name: MetallicMix
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Plate mode.

EffectDetails.Name: ModVerb
EffectDetails.Description: This modulating effect revisits the earthy combination of tremolo and spring reverb found in many vintage guitar amplifiers.

EffectDetails.Name: Offspring
EffectDetails.Description: Nothing else sounds like the Offspring reverb. This dramatic effect falls between the sound of an angel’s harp and a retro-futuristic sci-fi soundtrack.

EffectDetails.Name: OutboardSpring
EffectDetails.Description: Outboard Spring was inspired by the sound of intensely crafted outboard spring tanks. It’s a sound sought after by surf rock guitarists from coast to coast.

EffectDetails.Name: PitchShiftModulation
EffectDetails.Description: Increase for more pronounced shimmer modulation.

EffectDetails.Name: DelayReverbCrossfade
EffectDetails.Description: Mix delay and reverb effect. Low values favor delay, high values favor reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: PitchShiftNormalCrossfade
EffectDetails.Description: Mix of normal and shimmer reverb. Increase to add more shimmer effect.

EffectDetails.Name: Plate
EffectDetails.Description: A meticulously crafted simulation of vintage plate reverb units for the 50s and 60. It replicates the beautiful audio blasting into the face of a metal sheet.

EffectDetails.Name: PreDelay
EffectDetails.Description: The delay time between the dry signal and the onset of the reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: PreDelayFeedback
EffectDetails.Description: Sets the amount of feedback applied to the pre-delay signal.

EffectDetails.Name: PreDelayFeedbackHighCut
EffectDetails.Description: Sets the pre-delay feedback high cutoff frequency.

EffectDetails.Name: PreDelayFeedbackLowCut
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for multiple modes.

EffectDetails.Name: Quantize
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for LoFi mode.

EffectDetails.Name: Reverse
EffectDetails.Description: Create chilling and dramatic backwards effects with this haunting reverb engine. Mix it with the dry signal for an unnerving shadow effect.

EffectDetails.Name: ReverbEngine
EffectDetails.Description: Applies a reverb effect to sound input, the Ventris Dual Reverb has two engines. Single and dual mode supported.

EffectDetails.Name: Room
EffectDetails.Description: Captures the ambient reverberations of a real acoustic space, from a warm and intimate household room to a larger theatre sized space.

EffectDetails.Name: Shimmer
EffectDetails.Description: This pitch shifting reverb engine mixes traditional room sounds with octave-up reflections for an angelic reverb effect.

EffectDetails.Name: Swell
EffectDetails.Description: Applies a volume swell effect to your instrument’s dry signal, which is then fed into the reverb effect for amorphous clouds of sound.

EffectDetails.Name: SwellTime
EffectDetails.Description: Adjust length of volume swell. Short to long.

EffectDetails.Name: Time
EffectDetails.Description: Sets min and max delay times.

EffectDetails.Name: TremoloDepth
EffectDetails.Description: Depth of tremolo effect.

EffectDetails.Name: TremoloRate
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for ModVerb mode.

EffectDetails.Name: TrueSpring
EffectDetails.Description: An exceptionally realistic effect with the unmistakable drip heard in vintage spring reverb equipped amplifiers, by Source Audio’s Scientist, Bob Chidlaw.
